text: Senecio thapsoides DC. is a plant in the aster family (Asteraceae). The species was formerly placed in subgenus Cineraria and is sometimes found as Cineraria thapsoides. Cineraria however is now almost entirely limited to Southern Africa. The species was first named by Augustin Pyramus de Candolle in 1838. It is recognized in Flora europaea with two subspecies: thapsoides and S. t. visianianus.Tutin, T.G. & Heywood, V.H. (1976). Flora europaea 4: 194 ==References== Category:Flora of Bosnia and Herzegovina Category:Flora of North Macedonia Category:Flora of Greece Category:Flora of Europe thapsoides
title: Senecio thapsoides
